feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix for SnapPDF when running in docker
  • v5.11.10 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10470

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.9...v5.11.10

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve performance of Html purifier.
  • Disable javascript in all invoice designs. (can be reversed by using DISABLE_PURIFY_HTML=true ).
  • Prevent deleted payments from showing in client portal.
  • v5.11.11 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10480

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.10...v5.11.11

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Minor fixes by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10481
  • Nordigen Transaction history UI by @dshoreman in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10425
  • Purify HTML: fix tagline by @ITSYV in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10483
  • v5.11.12 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10485
  • Fixes for PDF's by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10486
  • Reversion to ungoogled PDF generator
  • Fixes for Headers not appearing in statements

New Contributors

  • @ITSYV made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10483

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.11...v5.11.12

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.13
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.12...v5.11.13

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.14
entry.content:
What's Changed
